segments.text: Which ? Zina ? What time is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's seven-thirty . I want to know who left this note on my desk .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What note ? I can't see . I just pulled an all-nighter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a little green post-it note , stuck right in the middle of my computer screen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And ? What does it say ? Isn't there a name ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It says , Zina , I like how you rhumba . An admirer .
segments.speaker: S1
